name: GLM
author: Nipype (interface)
description:
GLM, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: GLM).

FSL GLM:
Example ------- >>> import nipype.interfaces.fsl as fsl >>> glm = fsl.GLM(in_file='functional.nii', design='maps.nii', output_type='NIFTI') >>> glm.cmdline 'fsl_glm -i functional.nii -d maps.nii -o functional_glm.nii'

inputs.name: Args
inputs.description: A string. Additional parameters to the command.

inputs.name: Contrasts
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Matrix of t-statics contrasts.

inputs.name: Dat norm
inputs.description: A boolean. Switch on normalization of the data time series to unit std deviation.

inputs.name: Demean
inputs.description: A boolean. Switch on demeaining of design and data.

inputs.name: Des norm
inputs.description: A boolean. Switch on normalization of the design matrix columns to unit std deviation.

inputs.name: Design
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. File name of the glm design matrix (text time courses for temporal regression or an image file for spatial regression).

inputs.name: Dof
inputs.description: An integer. Set degrees of freedom explicitly.

inputs.name: Environ
inputs.description: A dictionary with keys which are a bytes or none or a value of class 'str' and with values which are a bytes or none or a value of class 'str'. Environment variables.

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Input file name (text matrix or 3d/4d image file).

inputs.name: Mask
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Mask image file name if input is image.

inputs.name: Out cope
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output file name for cope (either as txt or image.

inputs.name: Out data name
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output file name for pre-processed data.

inputs.name: Out f name
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output file name for f-value of full model fit.

inputs.name: Out p name
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output file name for p-values of z-stats (either as text file or image).

inputs.name: Out pf name
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output file name for p-value for full model fit.

inputs.name: Out res name
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output file name for residuals.

inputs.name: Out sigsq name
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output file name for residual noise variance sigma-square.

inputs.name: Out t name
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output file name for t-stats (either as txt or image.

inputs.name: Out varcb name
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output file name for variance of copes.

inputs.name: Out vnscales name
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output file name for scaling factors for variance normalisation.

inputs.name: Out z name
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output file name for z-stats (either as txt or image.

inputs.name: Output type
inputs.description: 'nifti' or 'nifti_pair' or 'nifti_gz' or 'nifti_pair_gz'. Fsl output type.

inputs.name: Var norm
inputs.description: A boolean. Perform melodic variance-normalisation on data.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Filename for glm parameter estimates (glm betas).

output-files.name: Out cope
output-files.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Output file name for copes (either as text file or image).

output-files.name: Out data
output-files.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Output file for preprocessed data.

output-files.name: Out f
output-files.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Output file name for f-value of full model fit.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. File name of glm parameters (if generated).

output-files.name: Out p
output-files.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Output file name for p-values of z-stats (either as text file or image).

output-files.name: Out pf
output-files.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Output file name for p-value for full model fit.

output-files.name: Out res
output-files.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Output file name for residuals.

output-files.name: Out sigsq
output-files.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Output file name for residual noise variance sigma-square.

output-files.name: Out t
output-files.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Output file name for t-stats (either as text file or image).

output-files.name: Out varcb
output-files.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Output file name for variance of copes.

output-files.name: Out vnscales
output-files.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Output file name for scaling factors for variance normalisation.

output-files.name: Out z
output-files.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Output file name for copes (either as text file or image).
